title: Day 248 (Ezekiel 28-30) - Year 4

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! - Join our PATREON family for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Genesis 3:24

- Article: Is Ezekiel Speaking of Satan or the King of Tyre

- Article: Is the King of Tyre prophecy in Ezekiel 28 referring to Satan?

- Job 41:1

- Psalm 104:26

- Isaiah 27:1

- Isaiah 19:25

- D-Group Promo Video

- Find or start a D-Group near you!
